TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.InputEventArgs

summary.span: 为与鼠标相关且并不具体涉及鼠标按钮或鼠标滚轮的路由事件（如 ）提供数据。

span.span: Provides data for mouse related routed events that do not specifically involve mouse buttons or the mouse wheel, for example .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件数据类与以下附加事件一起使用。This event data class is used with the following attached events. - - - - - - 此事件数据类与以下路由事件一起使用。This event data class is used with the following routed events. 这些路由事件转发前面列出的附加事件，使其更易于访问中的常规元素模型 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 。These routed events forward the previously listed attached events to make them more accessible to the general element model in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. - - - - - - - - 附加事件和基本元素路由事件共享其事件数据，路由事件的冒泡和隧道版本也共享事件数据。The attached events and the base element routed events share their event data, and the bubbling and tunneling versions of the routed events also share event data. 这可能会影响事件在传输事件路由时的已处理特性。This can affect the handled characteristics of the event as it travels the event route. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [输入概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview)。For details, see [Input Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/input-overview). 除了与 所有路由事件相关的属性之外，在实现中可能使用的最有趣的属性 是公开当前按钮状态 (例如 ) 和) 的多个属性 。Other than the properties that are relevant for all routed events, the most interesting properties of that you might use in a implementation are several properties that expose the current button state (such as ) and ). 特别有用，因为您可以 对其进行检查。 is useful particularly because you can check on it. 请注意，专门处理鼠标按钮事件的事件使用不同的事件数据类 。Note that events that specifically deal with mouse button events use a different event data class, . 如果有输入模式或涉及按钮的交互（即使正在处理非按钮事件），则可使用鼠标按钮属性。The mouse button properties are available on in case there are input modes or interactions that involve the buttons even if you are handling a non-button event. 类提供用于确定鼠标状态的附加属性和方法。The class provides additional properties and methods for determining the state of the mouse.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Windows.Point GetPosition(class System.Windows.IInputElement relativeTo) cil managed
Public Function GetPosition (relativeTo As IInputElement) As Point

param.name: relativeTo
param.span: 要用作用于计算鼠标指针位置的参考框架的元素。

span.span: The element to use as the frame of reference for calculating the position of the mouse pointer.

summary.span: 返回相对于指定元素的鼠标指针位置。

span.span: Returns the position of the mouse pointer relative to the specified element.

returns.span: 相对于指定对象的鼠标指针位置的 x 和 y 坐标。

span.span: The x- and y-coordinates of the mouse pointer position relative to the specified object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 点 (0，0) 是引用框架的左上角。The point (0,0) is the upper-left corner of the frame of reference. 静态 方法还可用于获取鼠标的位置。The static method can also be used to obtain the position of the mouse.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void InvokeEventHandler (Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void InvokeEventHandler(class System.Delegate genericHandler, object genericTarget) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub InvokeEventHandler (genericHandler As Delegate, genericTarget As Object)
protected: override void InvokeEventHandler(Delegate ^ genericHandler, System::Object ^ genericTarget);

param.name: genericHandler
param.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用的一般处理程序。

span.span: The generic handler to call in a type-specific way.

param.name: genericTarget
param.span: 要对其调用处理程序的目标。

span.span: The target to call the handler on.

summary.span: 以特定于类型的方式调用事件处理程序，这样做可以提高事件系统效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现将泛型处理程序强制转换为 ，然后调用它。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 有关此实现模式及其原因的详细信息，请参阅 和 [路由事件概述](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview).
